titles.title: Coronavirus 2019 Special Enrollment Period Act
Coronavirus 2019 Special Enrollment Period Act
A bill to establish a special enrollment period for health plans offered on the Exchanges, in response to the public health emergency related to the coronavirus 2019.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Coronavirus 2019 Special Enrollment Period Act
This bill establishes a special enrollment period beginning July 1, 2020, and ending October 1, 2020, for health plans offered through health insurance exchanges.
